content: Posting here in case anyone finds this helpful, I've update my lukewilliamboswell/roc-things README so it's a bit like the beginnings of a Roc Awesome repository. I've just been collecting links to things because it can be hard to keep track. So hope others may find this useful. Please let me know if you think I should add anything or can improve this somehow :smile:

Just want to let everyone know I've cleaned up roc-awesome a bit.

If you have any projects or apps that you would like to share, please let me know! :hearts:

I've added a Future Language Changes section which includes Task as Builtin, and Module Params designs which I think are really exciting.

If you haven't seen those before I recommend them.
